quoteText: THE DELETION OF, ALTERATION OF, MIS-DELIVERY OF, OR FAILURE TO STORE DATA MAINTAINED OR TRANSMITTED BY THE SERVICES.
title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: Yahoo! isn't liable for deleting or failing to store Content, thus they can freely decide to delete any user-generated content.
